column4: when I try to run the terminal program it comes up on the toolbar as 'Starting terminal' but after a few seconds it goes away, and the window never pops up
how do I find out why I can't run terminal?
what happens when you do alt+f2 to get the run dialog and run gnome-terminal? does that work?
no, alt-F2 -> 'gnome-terminal' doesn't seem to do anything
